title: Monsters' Stormy Day
subtle: Humorous (fiction), 188 words, Level G (Grade 1), Lexile 460L, Fiction Series
description: Students have many ideas for inside play when it is storming outside, and so do monsters! The story reinforces sequential order and time and order words through an engaging tale of what three monsters decide to do on a stormy day.
meta: circus, flashlight, lightning, monsters, stormy, thunder
Use the reading strategy of retelling to understand and remember story events
Final Sound : Identify and discriminate final -er sound in words
R-Controlled Vowels : Recognize and write -er r-controlled vowel letter combination in words
Proper Nouns : Recognize and understand the use of proper nouns
Time and Order Words : Identify time and order words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
